sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' function HRPitch() { return ( <>
Accordion item 01
This is the first item's accordion body.
Accordion item 02
This is the second item's accordion body.
Call the HR ( office hours ) Good Morning/Good Afternoon Sir/Ma’am. Am I speaking to (Mr./Ms) (HR Name) from (COMPANY NAME)? *if wrong company * Sorry, can you please tell me in which company your currently working at ?(Note it down). if wrong number Sorry for disturbing, thank you If yes This is (YOUR NAME) and I am calling on behalf of Prof MR S Muraleedharan sir, Chief Placement Officer of Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Sriperumbudur. Could I please borrow 5 minutes of your time?If no I am so sorry to disturb you, (Sir/Ma'am). What time is suitable to call you back? (Note down the time) Thank you, (Sir/ Ma'am). (End Call) If yes Sir/ Ma'am, we are organising an event called the MOCK PLACEMENTS. This event is held exclusively for the pre-final year students of our college and assists them in preparing for the actual placements that will be held for them next year. The event aims to help students understand the requirements of the industry, by making them experience a one-on-one interview-like environment. We invite HRs and company executives to interview our pre-final year students in a mock placement setting. We've been doing this for the past 15 years and over 100 HRs are usually in attendance. Our aim is to give our students the opportunity to experience placements first-hand and learn how to conduct themselves in a professional manner. We believe our students deserve the maximum exposure our college can provide to them.This year it is being held in both online and offline mode. The online event is being held on the 17th of March and the offline is being held on the 24th of March. The event begins at 9:30 AM and will conclude at 3:00 PM. If you prefer our online event, it'll be held in Google Meet using break-out rooms. The timings and other arrangements can be tailored according to your specifications and based on your availability. If you decide to attend our offline event, You will be provided with breakfast, lunch, and refreshments. We will arrange a cab to and from our college. We assure you all the precautions will be taken. Do you have any queries for me, (Sir/Ma'am)? Refer FAQS Could I please have your E-Mail ID so I can send you a formal invite? (Note down the mail ID) Thank you so much for your time and patience, (Sir/Ma'am). We will shortly send you an email regarding the event details. Thank you. Have a nice day (Sir/Ma'am). (End Call)
) } export default HRPitch
